sections.name: Description
sections.html: The puppet master treats living minds like a child’s toys.

sections.name: Radillo
sections.html: Radillo has always been able to manipulate people with sweet words and subtle promises. Having learned to enforce this with magic, she plays with thoughts for pleasure or power, and has contacts in many cities whose minds belong fully to her.

tactics.name: Before Combat
tactics.text: The wizard casts mage armor, mind blank, misdirection, protection from energy (electricity, fire), resist energy (cold), and spell turning.

tactics.name: During Combat
tactics.text: The wizard uses dominate monster, weird, and mass hold person to control enemies, plus incendiary cloud and horrid wilting if they resist enchantments. She uses polymorph any object to change the last survivor into a marionette for her collection.

tactics.name: Base Statistics
tactics.text: Without mage armor, mind blank, misdirection, protection from energy, resist energy, and spell turning, the wizard’s statistics are AC 20, touch 16, flat-footed 17; Defensive Abilities none; Immune none; Resist none.

skills.name: Knowledge (dungeoneering, engineering, geography, nature, nobility, planes, religion)
